properties.areaDesc: Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision; Icy Cape to Cape Suckling; Cape Fairweather to Icy Cape; Cape Decision to Cape Edgecumbe; Southeast Alaska Outside Waters From Cape Edgecumbe to Cape Fairweather
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 28 at 5:11PM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
Seas will build over the outside waters through Tuesday night to
25 feet and 30 to 35 feet on Wednesday due to a very strong low
pressure system. Seas further offshore will build to 35 feet
during this time. Storm force winds of 50 to 60 kt out of the S-SE
will drive the building seas Tuesday night, followed by a wind
shift to the SW on Wednesday. SW swell behind the system will keep
seas elevated through Thursday morning. Marine travel will be
very hazardous over the Gulf of Alaska through this event.

NWSheadline: HIGH SEAS TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING
